title: "Send Unsent Messages" greyed out
content:
I have eMail waiting in the Outbox folder. I open the File menu. "Send unsent messages" is greyed out. I think this has been happening for about a week. I tried restarting Thunderbird. I am using version 115.10.1 (32-bit).

I could send email by moving my messages to the Draft folder, opening each one, and choosing File -> Send Now. But when I tried just now, "Send Now" was greyed out.

Thank you, Bob
creator: bobzmu

title: Mailing List
content: For the past several days I have been attempting to create a mailing list but It will not allow me to enter more than 6 email addresses. My list would have about 20 addresses. This is odd in and of itself but about a week ago I created a list with 7 email addresses. How can this be fixed? Thank you. Patrick

title: Re: Email Signature
content:

I'm having an issue uploading my email signature to Thunderbird. I've set it to the recommended size, but it's awfully pixelated. When I adjust the size to make it clearer, it becomes too large. I'm uploading a JPEG image. Please let me know how to remedy this. Thank you.

title: Bigpond email setup
content: Desperate help needed here. Since windows live mail stopped working a few weeks ago ive decided to try thunderbird as my new email program on windows 7 pc. Have downloaded but every time i try to add my bigpond email account it says it cant because either configuration, email address or password are incorect. Ive been talking with bigpond support for days and getting nowhere. The email and password are correct because i can access telstra webmail and weve tried both pop3 and imap config settings but getting nowhere. What is left to try? I tried adding a gmail to thunderbird and it worked but no luck with the bigpond email.

title: Emailweiterleitung Thunderbird
content:
Manche Emails werden (seit kurzer Zeit, möglicherweise aufgrundeines Updates?) beim Klick auf "Weiterleiten" völlig leer angezeigt. Wenn ich die Email als Anhang weiterleiten möchte, funktioniert dies, die Email ist im Anhang. Wenn "eingebetet" eingestellt ist, ist die Email leer. Ich möchte jedoch auf jeden Fall meine Weiterleitungen "eingebetet" durchführen.

Bitte um Hilfestellung.

title: IMAP protocole
content: Dear friends I have been using Thunderbird for years without problem. Yet, recently, Thunderbird has been unable to communicate with two IMAP servers : one from "orange" - the french internet services supplier - and one from Gmail. In both cases, I get a message " please enter a password for IMAP ". This is surprising because I never changed any password recently . I just loaded a new version of Thunderbird, (128.6) and I suspect it to be the culprit. Yet, I do not know where to define a new password : Is it on Thunderbird ? (I tried, but without success) or on my accounts on Gmail or Orange ? or both in thurderbird and on Gmail or Orange ? In this last case, how can I do it ? I raised the question to the help system of Orange, but they said it was a problem with Thunderbird... I would be very sad to be obliged to quit Thunderbird !
creator: JmarcB

title: messagerie Thunderbird
content: Bonjour, je ne reçoit plus mes mails avec thunderbird pour mon adresse bbox depuis le 13/01. Dans les paramètres du compte, paramètres, serveur, imap.bbox.fr, le port entrant est 143 et le smtp.bbox.fr, le port est 25, est ce bon? Dans l'icône thunderbird de la barre en bas de l'écran, il est indiqué que j'ai reçu 40 mail ? Je les reçoit par contre sur ma messagerie dans l'espace client bouygues. avez vous idée d'où peut venir mon problème, merci. Gilles

title: Cannot send or receive mails
content:
Bonjour, I have used TB fore more than 20 years without major problems but today I am stuck. The TB version I run on is: 128.6.0esr (64 bits) on Windows 10 I use three accounts with Orange, one has the problem, not the two others. Originally the settings were the same on all three/

pop.orange.fr Port 110, default 110 SMTP France Telecom / Orange Port 587, default 587

Having sought help from the French (my mother tong) TB forum, one suggested to replace those settings for: pop.orange.fr Port 995, default 110 SMTP France Telecom / Orange Port 465, default 587 As a result I no longer received the ERROR message asking me for a password, instead a small blue segment showed on the bottom right of my screen and, after a while...nothing: no mail IN no mail OUT. I tried these new settings on the two other accounts with just the same result: no mail IN no mail OUT. So I went back to the original ones.

Has anyone a clue?

Christian
creator: ck.b
